fxInfo_clarification: This variable is dichotomized in a similar fashion as the V-Dem Multiple Selection questions with each binary answer category suffixed with "_<Response number>".
fxInfo_ordering: This question is asked only if JREM is answered 1.
fxInfo_question: Under what conditions can judges be dismissed?

fxInfo_responses.value: General dissatisfaction (i.e. dismissal is fairly unrestricted) (0=No, 1=Yes) [CCP tag: JREMCON-1]
Crimes and other issues of conduct (0=No, 1=Yes) [CCP tag: JREMCON-2]
Violations of the constitution (0=No, 1=Yes) [CCP tag: JREMCON-4]
Left explicitly to non-constitutional law (0=No, 1=Yes) [CCP tag: JREMCON-90]
Other, please specify in the comments section (0=No, 1=Yes) [CCP tag: JREMCON-96]

name: e_ccp_jremcon
